page.title: 10ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Mrs. L. Reed Mrs.Reed makes corn dollies and was taught by her uncle.He used to work in the fields of corn and would plait a corn dolly called Country Mans Favour.He would,like other men,take his wife or loved one for a walk in the fields and on his way through would plait love symbols.While planting the corn the country folk would have a saying =4 seeds in a hole,1 for rook 1 for crow,1 to rot 1 to grow.The legend goes that if you take a sheaf of corn and plait it in to a Mother Earth the spirit of the corn will live in it till spring and then the corn will grow.You can make dollies from Wheat,Barley,Oats and Rye.Corn dolly ribbons-Red-Poppy in the corn,White-Purity,Blue-True blue,colour of corn flower,Green-Rebirth of Spring.
